description.black-white:
Using an odd shock wave, the user
inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same
type in the area around it.

description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Only Pokémon that share a type with the user will take damage from this move.
effect.shortEffect: Hits any Pokémon that shares a type with the user.
